transit_routes.note: Full day trip. Dramatic coastal drive. Combine volcano, falls, Pitons.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Marigot Bay
transit_routes.note: Beautiful protected bay. Restaurants, ferry across harbor.

featured_experiences.note: Most popular St. Lucia excursion. 8-hour tour. Book ahead.

featured_experiences.note: Challenging hike. Licensed guide required. Start early.

featured_experiences.name: Pigeon Island & Beach Day
featured_experiences.note: National landmark. $10 entry. Fort has best island views.
